text: isame shak nahin ki vah gaalib (aur) hikamat vaala hai aur hamane ibaraaheem ko isahaaq (sa beta) aur yaaqoob (sa pota) ata kiya aur unakee nasl mein paigambaree aur kitaab qaraar dee aur ham na ibaraaheem ko duniya mein bhee achchha badala ata kiya aur vah to aakherat mein bhee yaqeenee neko kaaron se hain
